title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform and unidentified young man sitting on the ground and whittling] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform and unidentified young man sitting on the ground and whittling] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : quarter-plate tintype ; 11.9 x 9.3 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather, floral and scroll design. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: United States.--Army.--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. Youth--1860-1870. Whittling--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Group portraits--1860-1870. Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
